title: A 225 m long train crosses another 150 m train in 12.5 s. If one of the trains travels at 72 kph, what is the speed of the other? - Quora

response.answer_text: Total length :225+150=375 m Time :12.5 s Speed of one train:72 km/h =20 m/s speed of another train = x m/s Speed=distance/time If both trains move in opposite direction 20+ x =375/12.5 20+ x = 30 x = 30–20=10 m/s If both trains move in the same direction x -20 =30 X= 50 m/s Thank you.
